Ann was the perfect host.  From the welcome smile, to the beautiful breakfast and the awesome surroundings, we were not disappointed.  Dangar island is beautiful and the weekend was made even more special by how well Ann looked after us.  Everything was as described and this place is full of history.  Definitely worth a visit
Gorgeous little treasure Dangar is! Ann is generous in sharing her little paradise, her amazing knowledge and stories. We will be back.
A charming B&B with lots of history and character. Ann took care of us and spoilt us with a lovely breakfast each morning. Not great for young families, but lovely for a couple.
Heritage house with a lovely host!

Ann's place is unique, historical and a memorable place to stay.  We enjoyed the history of the house, the stories told by Ann and the very genuine concern for our comfort on what was a 41 degree day.  Breakfast was delicious and tailored to our needs.  Thanks Ann for a lovely stay.
Lovely hosts on a beautiful island

We booked online through Air BNB for two adults and one infant.  Unfortunately, soon after we arrived, Ann told us there had been a billing error and asked for more money, stating we had not booked correctly online and had only paid half of what we should have. 
We showed her our booking confirmation to prove we had booked correctly, and she “let us stay”. We had booked and paid correctly, it appears there may have been a problem with the Air BNB site. However, from this point on staying there became very uncomfortable.
Over the next couple of days there were more problems. She could not tell us the wifi password, so we were unable to use the wifi. She told us we could not use the air conditioning. Finally, she refused us access to the kitchen to heat up our dinner, and told us we could not eat in the house, so we ended up eating cold pies in the garden at night. 
It was so uncomfortable we decided to leave early, and did not stay the last night.

name: Old Montreal.  ( Rent for at least 12 months)
summary: Great Apartment ideal for 1-2 guests, located in the heart of Old Montreal in the historic Basilica Notre-Dame area, surrounded by best restaurants, shops and major city attractions,two minutes walking to the Old Port. Very quiet building.  Condo rent  for at least 12 months, Contact me for detail

reviews.txt: Great location!  Unit was just as described.

The host was very responsive from checkin through to checkout. He waited for us to give us the keys and show us around though our train was two hours late. The place is as described new, modern, extremely clean. The building that the unit is small and quiet despite being extremely well situated. Would love to stay here again.

Andy was very accommodating . He took the time to walk us around the neighborhood and get us acclimated. The loft was perfect and the location was extremely convenient. Everything we needed and expected.
Wonderful, clean and modern apartment in a perfect location. Really appreciated the communication and flexibility with A when our plane was delayed and then rescheduled multiple times.

Vous pouvez y aller sans hésitation, c'est bien comme décrit dans la présentation et le quartier est idéal pour visiter Montréal.
Certes l'appartement n'est pas très lumineux, mais il est rare d'être en centre ville avec une vue imprenable sur la campagne! Et puis on n'y est surtout la nuit...

The loft was immaculate! The decor was lovely as well. It felt "good" - comfortable and safe the moment I walked in. I appreciated the security lock at the entrance to the building and the elevator. The location was awesome, just meters from the Basilica as promised. Also only a few short blocks to a metro stop to get to the 747 Bus to the airport.

I loved my stay in Montreal!! The air bnb was perfect for my short 3 night stay and I felt very comfortable there, it was definitely clean and tidy and had everything that I needed for my stay. I would most certainly use this air bnb again if I visited again. Many Thanks

Great place, great location, and Andrew was very helpful and easy to communicate with.  It's steps from Notre Dame cathedral, and was a convenient place to be: in Old Montreal/Ville-Marie, but also right by the Place d'Armes metro station, Chinatown, and the bus to Mile End/Quartier des Spectacles. We found it very peaceful and relaxing, and great for an afternoon nap after a long walk!

The apartment was clean, quiet, open, and airy, there was free wifi and Netflix, and basic kitchen amenities, including a coffee maker. We enjoyed getting some bread, fruit, and veggies from Marché Jean-Talon and having them for breakfast. 

I would gladly stay here again, so I guess that's the best recommendation!
The host was great.Friendly,easy to communicate with.  Great location
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I did not have firm arrival time and Andrew worked with me to make sure the key was exchanged without a problem. I wanted a downtown location and it was seconds away from the Basillica Notre Dame.  The loft was spacious, clean, modern, comfort  and attractive decor, with a well equipped kitchen, plenty of closet space and large bath area with shower/bath combined and a working air conditioner that I appreciated because there were some very warm days.   I did not meet Andrew  but all my questions were answered promptly.
The description was accurate and met our needs.

Great little studio in the heart of Old Town - super convenient and steps from the Notre-Dame Basilica. The apartment has everything you need and is impeccably clean. 

Only slight downside for us was the communication style - not quite as welcoming and flexible as we've become accustomed to with Air BnB hosts. More of a serviced apartment experience rather than a true Air BnB but comfortable and positive overall none the less. Thank you!
Great place in an excellent location. Highly recommended.
Great location in the heart of old Montreal.
The host canceled this reservation 112 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Andy’s space was located in the most amazing location in Montreal. Walking distance to anything and so many options for shopping, food, patios, etc. The space is so cute and trendy just as described. They offer so many amenities in the kitchenette and bathroom so you don’t have to run out for the little things you might need. Very quiet inside the space. Check in involved walking to a nearby location to get the key from a lockbox but was manageable. Thx again !

Nice apartment in a great location.  However, this apartment is in a building that does not allow short term rentals.  We were not told beforehand.  There is a warning on the front door that you do so at your own risk.  Also, the owners were not very responsive to our concerns regarding the smoke alarm beeping regularly while we were there (it was never fixed for the full week we were there), and that there were no pillowcases for the extra pillows.

Perfect location for St Catherine’s and the Plateau. The apartment was in a great location and felt very safe with security door to main entrance. My wife and I loved our stay. Would highly recommend this appartment.

Olga and Andrei's place was very stylish, in a great neighbourhood, and easily accessible.  Contrary to what people are saying about the key location, it was very easy to find and a 3 minute walk from the condo.
Cons: There is a sign on the front door prohibiting short term rentals (Sharebnbs), the pillows were flat as a pancake (there were extras in the closet but no pillowcases to go with them), a dishcloth and/or a hand towel would have been appreciated. 
Pros: The place was super quiet, in a lovely area, the bed was comfy, and we very much enjoyed our stay.

name: Chic 2BR in Festival Quarter by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the beautiful panoramic windows, sleek decor, and fully-equipped kitchen. Located in the Quartier des Spectacles, known for the renowned Contemporary Art museum - Place-des-Arts, you're close to an array of wonderful local shops and restaurants.

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Sharebnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt: Great experience, treated us well
Perfect location had a little Hiccup  with finding which apt was mine wasn't listed in guest details other than that I enjoyed my stay super clean neat .....I want a condo now haha

Location of the codo is very convenient for the seekers of "hub of attraction"
The condo is as perfect as shown in the pics and even better.
Flatbook made the stay very pleasant because of their 24/7 prompt responses and assistance.
Very well recommeded.
Our stay was great. Access codes were emailed to us before arrival, location was very convenient and the apartment was clean and well furnished. Wish every Sharebnb was this easy.

We loved staying at this condo! The condo was clean, spacious and in a great location. The host responded to our questions within minutes and provided us with everything we asked for. We definitely want to stay at this condo again the next time that we are in Montreal.

Logement parfaitement conforme à la description. Tres bien situé et tres bien desservi. Communication très facile avec le propriétaire. Je recommande fortement cet appartement pour decourvrir Montreal.
Tout était comme nous l'attendions

Close to downtown Montreal. Had a wonderful stay at this location! Brand new condo, extremely clean! We had a great time at this air bnb!
Will definitely stay here next time we are in time.
Super easy check-in/check-out process. Great spot and location, very clean, everything necessary for a good stay.

The Sondra group replied to any questions I had promptly and thoroughly.  The apt had all the amenities you could want, great wifi, and great suggestions for what to do and see in Montreal.  
The location was perfect as it was in walking distance to Old Montreal, downtown and Rue St Dennis.
They even left a nice gift for my birthday in the apt for when I arrived!  I highly recommend them for your stay in Montreal!
Mike White
We received lots of info prior to our stay and everything is well thought out. Location was great and the space was exactly what we were after.  Great!
Great location and nice unit.

Lovely condo that looks true to the photos and is in excellent condition. Kitchen was well appointed with the basic things we needed. Beds are a bit noisy and bedding is nice to look at but cheap quality so not very comfortable. Note that it is a great, central location though is on a somewhat seedier block of Ste. Catherine so you will see homeless people hanging around the church across the street from the condo often. We didn't have any issues though. As well, the smoke detector was off the wall and not working when we arrived, but I received a prompt reply via email from Sonder with an offer to fix it ASAP. Overall a good place to stay in downtown Montreal.

하얏트 호텔과 1.5블럭 정도 거리, 번화가와 가까운편
시설 깔끔하고 수건 등의 요구사항도 잘 들어줌

We enjoyed our stay in Sonder's place. The check in was easy and the apartment is really well located to get around the city. You can walk both to the Plateau area and the Old Town. 

The apartment also had everything we needed for our stay and we where able to eat some evenings at home when we did not have the energy to go out. One of the beds squeaked quite a bit so if you are a light sleeper it could be a bit hard. I would recommend a stay at the apartment.

Incredibly inflexible and unhelpful. Had to cancel a trip due to an illness. Very much understand no refund being made available as it was a last minute change. That being said, I did not expect to be charged cleaning fees for an unused apartment that had been cleaned prior to our arrival. 

AVOID

Great location close to everything! Only a few short blocks to the Just For Laughs festival and Place des Arts. Walking distance to the entertainment area of Rue Saint-Denis, Old Montreal and numerous other attractions.
Condo was new, very bright, very clean and modern in a secure building. Easy access instructions. Easy and great communication with the folks at Sonder. 
Hope to stay here again someday.

Horrible time entire family had to shower at ymca
Spent more time on the phone being passed around from rep to rep and low ball offers of compensation
Disgusted

This apartment is really well located! Super easy check in and check out. The apartment is so nicely decorated, super well furnished and extremely clean. I wish there was a little more of lights in the rooms.

name: ROOM + ENSUITE INNER CITY MOD HOUSE
summary: Large room with en-suite full personal bathroom plus own TV  in modern house with all mod cons less than 10 minutes to the city by bus and a short walk to cafes, restaurants and pubs plus shopping. Set in a quiet friendly back street with parking.

host.about: Hi, What can I say other than I am 39 years old, professional female in a relationship. Very easy going. I just recently renovated my whole house, pretty much a knock down job so new everything. I heard about air B&B and thought what a great idea. I have a clean house including a great kitchen so feel free to make yourself at home when you stay with me. Just let me know if there is anything in particular you may need. This is also the perfect room to shut yourself away in if that is what you'd prefer.

reviews.txt: I didn't meet Alison as she was away, but Adam let me in and explained everything to me. The house is beautifully (and very newly) renovated, the bed was wonderfully comfortable, and I had my own huge bathroom which was very luxurious. The street is quiet but very convenient to everything. All in all, a great bargain and a lovely place to stay - I'll be back!

Although I did not meet Alison, Adam showed me around.
He is very relaxed and this place was realy nice to stay.
Great bathroom and friendly quiet neighbourhood.  Easy to go to from this place to go to the centre as well.
Great stay in Rozelle in Alison's house. I needed a quiet and peaceful place to put my head each night while visiting friends in Sydney and it lived up to expectations!

Staying with Allison and Adam was wonderful. The place is centrally located and easy to walk to downtown Sydney or even take a bus. I was able to get in a game of cricket with Adam I had a blast coming from America this was my first experience in Australia. The place is very clean and modern love the bathroom and the kitchen is great too. The bedroom was at the top of flat very quiet, clean the bed was very comfortable slept well. I would highly recommend this place for anyone in the future it was wonderful place to stay Adam and Allison are great!
Easy stay with excellent bus connection to the city. Shower was my favourite at this place, besides of that I had a good sleep in the comfy bed.
Adam has been very helpful. House is modern and very quiet. My first time using Sharebnb and am impressed
The house was in an ideal spot for the party I was attending.  Warm comfy bed and lovely hot shower.

Alison and Adam were my saviours in Sydney. our logistics officer booked us an hotel in the middle of nowhere in Ryde, claiming that it was the nearest point to Sydney Olympic Park as i had to attend the WPC14 with my colleagues. When i check the location, had to cancel and rushed to my ultimate accommodation portal, broadcasting generic message to nearby hosts to secure an accommodation the soonest.

Alison was among the first to reply, and to pre-confirm...
By the time i got there, Adam was already waiting for me and even kind enough to give me all the directions at 8am and off course waited for me outside to make sure that i'm paying the right cab fee. 

What can i say Adam, made feel at home from very first moment, kind, genuine and warm welcoming host. The house is is really nice fully refurbished, in a quite and well connected neighbourhood. My room was upstairs, a nice sunny room with  a queen bed and a bathroom attached. After i dropped in my luggage, Adam gave me guided orientation tour to the house, with access to all amenities. 

Felt like a VIP 5 star treatment as Adam even gave me a pre-paid bus ticket, which made my first(s) bus rides easier as some stations are pre-paid only.  So now that you that i have been at a great apartment, with great hosts, that's all, Rozelle is a really nice neighbourhood. walking distance from my hosts' place, you can make it to the main street packed, with cafe, bars and restaurant, a vibrant market and lot of attractions. if you happen to stay over a weekend don't miss Rozelle Market (Sat & Sun). 

Now the funny part, Adam was so happy to receive me as he's a all star backgammon player and he knows that Lebanese people are really good at that and he was so eager for round. One night we decided to play a round and Adam's expectations went all down the drain, i think i was the first Lebanese ever to be clumsy backgammon player. We agree that we will play another time via (Hidden by Sharebnb) and i will have support from fellow Lebanese players :)

All in all, i great time, the house is warm, clean, and comfortable and the hosts are simply AWESOME

Alison immediately replied to my booking request and organised for her hubby to meet me as I was checking in late.

They were very helpful and gave me a bus card to use. The room was very spacious and the house was close to transport and restaurants.

Excellent hosts in an excellent location.

I had a great stay! Alison was very efficient with my booking and advised me Adam would look after me on arrival. Adam was a great host, carried my case upstairs and even invited me to the pub. The room comfortable and had a great view. The bus around the corner was very convenient for me to get into the city. Thanks for having me!

It is lovely neighborhood, very easy access to all the buses to the city center. The host adam has been helpful and was generous to let me use his living room for my work. The first night the room floor was dusty but was happy it was thoroughly cleaned on the second day. The only concern I had was the room has no lock, given I was the only female guest in the house and did not know any of other (male) guests on the first day of arrival, I was slightly nervous in the first night until I met other guests who were very kind and friendly.

Thanks for a great stay, I have stayed here on three occasions, and have been welcomed by a very considerate host each time. The property is located close to shops restaurants and the gym. I would highly recommend this property and am looking forward to my next visit
Cheers
Elise

name: Sunny, private room on St. Denis
summary: 1 sunny, large, bright room available in 4 bedroom, 3rd floor walk up apartment on the corner of St. Denis & Sherbrooke. Close to vibrant night life but quiet apartment, downtown easily accessible. Bed, desk, window, dresser in a private room.

reviews.txt: si la descripción del anuncio es correcta, la casa muy bien localizada , muy limpia y muy cómoda.
It was an awesome stay!! Room is tide and clean, love the neighborhood, perfect location and the price is very reasonable. Highly recommend
Great place located in central Montreal! It is within walking distance to all the sights and sounds of Montreal and extremely convenient for travelers.

I had a very nice and relaxing time staying at Stephanie's place. The room was bright and tidy and the apartment was as well. I was made to feel very welcome and the all the house info is printed out for easy access. Fantastic neighbourhood as well.

Bon accueil de Stéphanie, très arrangeante pour l'entrée dans le logement. Jolie chambre bien localisée,  belles serviettes fournies. Attention au lit (assez mou, à ressorts), et aux toilettes (communes à la salle de bain dans une coloc de 5 avec nous il faut bien viser pour y accéder) ; mais le prix étant très bas on ne veut pas se plaindre ! :)
Très bon quartier, et très bon accueil !!

The was exactly how I imagined it. Stephanie was really accommodating and respectful of my quietness. Can't beat the price and location combo everything is within 2min in every direction. Also a good coffee shop right underneath the apartment is so convenient. Only wish I had access to the balcony but that's just me. Overall perfect!

name: Allotja't en un elegant i lluminós pis modernista al costat de Passeig de Gràcia
summary: Deixa't seduir per l'encant dels paviments de mosaic i els alts sostres artesonats d'aquest elegant i lluminós apartament modernista  ubicat en un edifici classic rehabilitat i  a tant sols 30 metres del Passeig de Gracia

host.about: Hi we are Lluis and Lali, we have rehabilitated this luminous apartment at heart of Barcelona. If you come to our city, this is a fantastic option, premium located, to enjoy your stay. See you at BCN :)

reviews.txt:
The appartment is situated near the public transport and the great shopping street "Passeig de Gràcia" with a lot of shops, cafés and restaurants.
 
Due to the central proximity the appartement is perfect for a sightseeing trip in Barcelona (10 min to walk to Plaça Catalunya, 2 min walk to the taxis and the bus stops).
 
The appartment is newly renovated, with modern furniture and a beautiful old tiled floor and stucco work in some of the rooms.
 
The automatic air conditioning for manual temperatur setting is very comfortable.
The conservatory (winter garden) is a additional room with a view in the courtyard (the view is not very spectacular but it is very comfortable there). Since the appartment is in the city center there is no fabulos view from none of the windows - but this does not matter at all.
 
There is also a Nespresso coffee machine in the modern kitchen (bring the capsules by your one or there is a Nespresso shop 100m away).
 
We can fully recomand this special appartment and Lluis as perfect host in this wunderful city.
Muchos gracias Lluis!!
 
Marcella and familiy

 *   * 



Das Appartment ist in unmittelbarer Nähe vom öffentlichen Verkehr und der grossen Einkaufsstrasse "Passeig de Gràcia" mit unzähligen Läden, Cafes und Restaurants.




Ideal für einen Sightseeing-Aufenthalt in Barcelona, da zentral gelegen (ca. 10 min zu Fuss zur Plaça Catalunya, 2 min zum Taxi-Stand und Bus-Haltestellen).


Wir waren zu 5. für drei Tage in Lluis Wohnung und haben uns sofort sehr wohl gefühlt. Lluis war bei der Schlüsselübergabe bereits vor Ort und hat uns gute Tipps für Barcelona gegeben. 



Die Wohnung ist neu renoviert, modern eingerichtet und hat wunderschöne alte Böden und Stuckaturen in manchen Zimmern.

Es hat eine automatische Lüftung: Die Temperatur kann manuell eingestellt werden (sehr angenehm).

Der verglaste Raum („Wintergarten“) ist ein zusätzlicher Raum mit Aussicht auf den Innenhof (die Aussicht ist jetzt nicht wirklich atemberaubend, aber es ist sehr gemütlich). Eine schöne Aussicht gibt es von keinem Fenster aus, da sich die Wohnung Mitten in der Stadt befindet - Stört aber nicht.

Es hat eine Nespresso-Kaffee-Maschine (Kapseln selber mitbringen oder 100m von der Wohnung gibt’s einen Nespresso-Shop).


Wir können die Wohnung und Lluis als Gastgeber nur weiterempfehlen.

Muchos gracias Lluis!!!


Marcella and familiy

Apartment´s location is top, just off Passeig de Gràcia. The apartment has a good & simple restauration preserving the original modernist floors & ceilings yet with modern kitchen and bathrooms.
Lluis was a great helpful host & proved to be very professional. 
Highly recommended.

Lluis is the perfect host, with great communication beforehand and a very warm welcome, he was also really flexible and understanding at check out too.

The apartment is really well located and as shown in the pictures very clean, tidy and stylish.

The apartment has great facilities, the kitchen is fully stocked (not the we needed to use it with so many great restaurants) and the shower was fantastic.

The beds are really comfortable, and the rooms very quiet (if you have the windows closed) and there is air con.

I would definitely book this place again and look forward to returning.
Huge thanks!
Very nice place to live...

The apartment is perfect. Great location, close to the metro station on ‘Passeig de Garcia’. 5-10 min. walking distance to many attractions such as Gaudi’s casa mila, Plaça Catalunya, Rambla st. and more.
The apartment is very big with all the needed facilities. It’s just been renovated and it’s clean and comfortable. 
Lluis was a great host. Help us with all our needs, even with ticket to Barcelona FC game. He was very flexible with our check-in and check-out times, and gave us tip for good restaurants in the area. 
Highly recommended. I’m sure you’ll enjoy its as we did.

Lluis' place was clean, well equipped and perfect for our four day stay in Barcelona.
The location of the apartment is fabulous and dealing with Lluis was seamless.
The photos and descriptions match reality to the T.
Thank you Lluis for having us.

Lluis is great. He was very responsive and accommodating. His apartment is even better than pictured. It is in a lovely area with many good restaurants near by (paco meralgo for example). Morning and evening coffees from his nespresso machine in the gallery were a treat. I would stay there again. Perfect for up to 6 people.

Lluis is a perfect host in every respect.
The apartment is lovely furnished with an eye on detail and good quality. You will find everything you could possibly need in there, starting from equipment (wlan, hairdryer, kitchen equipment etc.) to things like guides and books of Barcelona and Gaudi (in spanish) as well as  brochures on tourist attractions.

Lluis is very attentive and provides you with all kind of information.
Thank you as well for the flexible check-in/out.
The 6 of us were all happy to have chosen this apartment for our weekend-trip.
We can highly recommend it!

Me and my friends had a wonderful time at Lluis' apartment. The place was neat and clean, spacious and comfortable. A nice surprise was that the 'gallery' is really a balcony when you open the outside doors, so you can enjoy the afternoon sun. Lluis is a straightforward and very friendly host. The location is perfect for a weekend trip and I would definitely recommend this apartment to parties of 4-6.

I traveled to Barcelona with 3 other adults and my 2 young girls. The house was fantastic (as was Lluis); I would gladly stay here again. Everything was great, the only thing I would warn you about is the Master Bedroom being loud at night as it faces the main street (noise of cars driving by etc.).

We loved staying at this amazingly located, clean, spacious and hip apartment. We travel often and are very picky so trust this review. They thought of all the details and amenities and the kitchen was very well equipped (they even thought of paper towels, tin foil, plastic wrap) and all appliances were new. The beds were very comfortable and the bathrooms roomy for Europe. Our hosts were friendly and willing to help in any way to make our trip enjoyable. Two of our children got ill and the host even made an appointment for us with their pediatrician and emailed to check up on how the kids were feeling after. Now, that's service! Our only regret was that we didn't stay longer...

We were warmly welcomed by our host on arrival even though it was quite late at night.  The apartment was well set out, clean, tidy and large enough to accommodate 5 adults. Our host emailed us with suggestions for day trips.  The maps provided about local restaurants and nearby supermarkets were appreciated. This apartment is in a great location in Barcelona, although a little noisy some nights. Barcelona is a wonderful city to visit and we can recommend taking the time to venture further out of the city.

Lluis was a great host and very helpful! He met us as soon as we arrived, and showed us around the apartment, which was exactly as seen in the pictures. During our week's stay he e-mailed me info on local restaurants to visit, as well as was responsive to questions I had about the city. We traveled with our 6 month old, and he helped provide us with a crib on request. All in all, a great place to stay with a great host!

Thank you for having us again Lluis.
As on our previous visit, everything ran smoothly and we very much enjoyed your beautiful apartment, hospitality and flexibility with our late departure.
See you in Barcelona sometime soon.

Nous avons très bien été reçu par Lluis, le quartier est vraiment très sympa. L'appartement est vraiment très bien décrit et très agréable.
Lluis est vraiment très disponible et très gentil.
Nous avons passé un très bon moment.

Lluis is very prompt in providing information and responding to questions.  We were not urged or required to check in at any certain time, he is very patient and understandable.  There are more amenities than other places, We really did not expect the nespresso, made us feel very welcome!

La experencia ha sido fantastica, la casa esta muy bien situada, muy limpia y muy bien amueblada, no le falta ni un detalle. Lluis se ha portado muy bien con nosotras, ha sido muy hospitalario y muy atento.

Lluis and his wife are very nice hosts.The apart is stylish and cosy,very clean.Another advantage is perfect location.Just one thing to know it was a bit noisy at night from the street.But it couldn't change our impression from the stay!Next time we will choose the same apart!

Lluis' lejlighed er meget hyggelig og rar at være i. Lejligheden indeholder alt, hvad man har brug for - og lidt til :-) Beskrivelsen af lejligheden stemmer overens med virkeligheden. Lluis tager godt imod sine gæster og sørger for relevant information om lejligheden og omgivelserne.
Vi kan varmt anbefale andre at bo i lejligheden.

We had a wonderful time in this modern and clean apartment which is perfectly centrally located, nice shops in the neighborhood. The beds were very good. We liked the rain shower and the bath. Everything was very good and we would like to come back one time. Lluis is very helpful.

name: Museum Mile 1 BR - Madison Ave
summary: Welcome to our Madison Ave apartment. You will find this listing so charming, and well located. The apartment has a queen bedroom, balcony off the living room, and a spacious living room with a sleep sofa, and desk.

reviews.txt:
I stayed at USA Stay's apartment for a little over 2 months while I was on a business trip in New York. Excellent location if you prefer a quiet neighborhood. There is quite a number of restaurants and shops close by and it is only two blocks away to Central Park. Public transportation is within walkable distance too. 
Please note that you will need to buy some necessities such as trash bags, shampoos and so on as this is not an apartment that someone currently lives in (more of a hotel style with an empty furnished room). Also the streets could be a little loud at night because it faces to Madison Avenue. The service calls were handled promptly. Check in and out were easy. 
Overall I enjoyed my stay at this apartment and would recommend it to anyone who prefers a convenient location but not right into midtown where the traffics are.

This apartment is perfect for one person or couples staying in NYC for a long period and looking to experience the real Upper East Side, with its beautiful residences, shops and restaurants. The location is prime, very easy to hop on a bus or subway and make it anywhere. Nightlife is not big around, it's actually quiet and nice at night. Dave from USA Stay was super nice and helped solving certain issues that came up. The communication was great. There's a little market and cleaners downstairs, which is super convenient, and a Duane Read/Walgreens a couple of blocks away. You'll be 1 block from Central Park and the apt itself is incredibly cozy. You'll feel at home. Thank you!

The location and service was outstanding. However, be aware that the apartment is old and therefore not well isolated. You hear traffic from Madison Avenue, your neighbours and noisy radiators. Sometimes the water will never get hot, forcing you to take cold showers. Radiators may not work on cold days.
We stayed for two months in a nice location but the apartment disappointed us, especially when we considered the high price of our 2 months stay.

The apartment is located at UES, one block from Central Park and within close proximity within several museums (The Met, Guggenheim, Copper Hewitt). Nearest subway station is on either 96th street (6 train) or 86th street (4,5,6 trains).

The apartment is on the third floor of the building. The neighbourhood is generally quiet with the exception of traffic noises and bus noises (there's a bus stop right below) but apart from that it's generally quiet at night. 

It's a cosy apartment, and has everything you would typically need. The small refrigerator works well, however do note that the freezer section doesn't work, so avoid purchasing items that require freezing. Wifi and cable TV works well too.

I had no problems with the hot water in the shower, but do note that it does take a few minutes for it to get hot. 

Communication was great and the host, he was always quick to respond to questions or any problems. I found them incredibly communicative and helpful. 

I stayed for a period of two months. I am seldom around during the day as I am at work, and am usually only around at night. 

Overall I am satisfied with the apartment and my stay. 

Thank you very much!

We do NOT recommend to stay in this apartment for several reasons. First, there are cockroaches. First thing we saw upon entering were cockroaches in the kitchen area - without even having any food around or cooking. This was not properly disclosed before arrival. Although they sent somebody over who laid out baits, the roaches did not disappear. Second, (at least) two times there were unannounced strangers entering the apartment in order to look at it or to even take pictures. We know because we were at the apartment at this time. Third, the apartment faces Madison Ave, so it is rather loud. In addition, the windows are not well sealed so it gets cold/hot easily. Overall, considering what you get, the apartment is overpriced. In addition to get the key, you have to travel across the city to pick it up - very inconveniently.

El sitio me pareció inmejorable, ni muy céntrico, ni muy alejado, y muy buenos transportes públicos, metro a 10 min. y autobus a piede casa.
El edificio es antiguo, escalera de madera y sin ascensor, pero muy bonito y con balconcillo, tipo Friends. Yo mismo vivo en un edificio antiguo.el apartamento estaba limpio excepto por la nevera, que tuvimos que limpiarla a fondo
Calefacción y aire acondicionado. Muy necesarios los dos porque las temperaturas son un poco extremas.
WiFi muy bueno, Potente (llegaba hasta la parada del autobús) y muy veloz. Televisión con múltiples canales
Los quince primeros días estuvimos cuatro personas (mis dos hijos) y estuvimos un poco justos (sofá-cama) pero después una pareja, y perfecto.
Le vendría bien al apartamento una mano de pintura.
Es tuvimos mes y medio y NYC es maravilloso, el sitio y el apartamento me encanto, salvo pequeñas cosas, y el anfitrion fue muy amable ya que nos dejó hacer el check out a la 1:00 pm.
La comunicación fue siempre por email
Good location & vintage interior

name: Wellyet Guest House@Room 2
summary: Located at the heart of city Tsim Sha Tsui area, MTR, Bus Stop at door front; minutes walking distance to Star Ferry. All amenities near by, includes 7-Eleven, Bakery, Starbucks, shopping centers, restaurants, pubs etc.

host.about: Taking life break after 15 years studying and working in Australia. Enjoy and love to travel around and meet people, share culture differences. Learn new recipes, try on different kind of delicious food.

loc.address: Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
The Host was cheerful and helpful on arrival and the room was clean and ready upon arrival. The Flats were quiet during the stay which was great as I really needed the rest after a long day of Business meeting. 
Highly recommended.
It was indeed a wonderful experience. Natalie was so accomodating and she helped us a lot, especially for us first timers! We highly recommend her. And the room was so clean! :)
虽然房间系比较细,但好在够干净,而且员工的服务好好,态度够热情｡两晚住得好开心(●°u°●) ｣房间里面有一个插座转换器,方便充电,梳洗用具全部都准备有,要热水同冻水可以出去装,随时都有噶,好方便的(✪▽✪)性价比算系比较高的!

Natalie's guest house was a really small room in the tourist-center of Hong Kong. The room and the guest house provided everything one needs for a short visit in Hong Kong: WiFi, Shower, bed, and a safe place to stow your stuff away.
The air-con is quite loud during the night, but turning it of will lead to quite a hot room!

Although I haven't seen Natalie, her "ladies" were extremely friendly and helpful, even there was a language-barrier. BUT the sharebnb experience - talking to locals - was missing.

The only thing, which is offended me, were the watch/stuff-salesmen right out of the guest house.

Natalie is a welcoming host, friendly and helpful. Her place is located at a convenient location just a couple of minute's walk to the MTR station. The room is as it describes, clean and everything is handy to get. Would recommend travellers to have a short stay at Natalie's place.

I had a very pleasant stay at Natalies guesthouse. It's in a great location from where you can reach everything easily (the MTR station is right next to the building). One part of the guesthouse was under renovation but Natalie gave me a bigger better room without charging me extra. The room itself was super clean, comfortable and perfect for a short holiday in Hong Kong. It had everything I needed - AC, little bathroom with shower, fresh towel everyday, shampoo and a big comfortable bed. You also feel really safe as you can only get into the guesthouse and room with a special keycard. The staff was super helpful too and so was Natalie. I only met her in person once, but she is incredibly friendly and really makes sure you have a pleasant stay. I can recommend the guesthouse for those who travel by themselves and need a quiet room to come back to in the midst of bustling Hong Kong. Thanks a lot, Natalie! All the best, Juliana
The place is clear
房东姐姐很可爱,很耐心的给我指路,房间很干净!
1泊しました｡値段が安い｡その割には安全です｡女性の受付で親切でした｡ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙ1枚と歯ﾌﾞﾗｼがｻｰﾋﾞｽでありました｡
The place is clean and the crew is adorable! Very well situed in downtown HK. I stayed 5 nights in this tiny room without any problem. Recommended!
Natalie was super friendly and very helpful. Room was as described although the mattress was a little uncomfortable. Other than that, it was okay.
Fast response, the place is in the heart of the city, not difficult to find halal food nearby the hotel
Bed is comfortable. Good location. The lady boss, Natalie, is helpful and gives good suggestion. Will recommend for stay though the building looks old and black outside but inside the room is clean.

What a find! Location location location.  This super lovely spot was right in the center of everything including right on top of a train station.  Natalie was a perfect host and I felt completely taken care of.

처음 숙소를 찾을 때 힘들었지만 wellyet식구들과 위쳇으로 연락하며 숙소를 찾을 수 있었다.
처음 체크인을 할 때 키 보증금을 내는 줄 몰랐으나, 보증금을 내는게 당연하다고 생각했다.
처음 방을 보았을때 작다고 생각했었으나, 지내다보니 혼자 지내기에는 충분한 숙소였다!
다들 너무 친절하고 웃음이 많아서 행복한 여행을 보냈다!! 다음에 홍콩에 또 온다면 또 다시 묵고 싶은 숙소다!! 감사했어요~

The room is just as specified. Comfortable, clean and on a building located in the perfect spot if you want somewhere easily accessible to the main areas of HK. Victoria harbor is just 8 minutes away walking.

This place is great for short stays when visiting the city, it's more of a place to settle down after long days out. Check-in was smooth and helpful. Looks exactly like the pictures and it's clean, the hosts are mostly there to accommodate your requests.

Central down town area. Everything is at a walking distance. 
The room is ok. I felt very comfortable. 
I would pay a little more attention to the little details. I think that with little money and little effort it could look a lot better.  
In any case, i would repeat

Good location and good price. 
Stuff is nice too !

I will recommend

位置方便､價格便宜､服務親切
雖然隔音不好晚上很吵雜
但以價格來看是不錯的選擇

name: ☼☼ Lovely Colorful Studio ☼☼ Tsim Sha Tsui
summary: My Lovely Colorful Studio is in the center of the popular district Tsim Sha Tsui. There are many Yummy restaurants and shops, it's a very good location, It's the real Hong Kong. With 200 sqft and good design you will feel like home. It's located in a walk up building (2nd floor), right in the center of TST, less than 2min by walk from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★

host.about:
Hello i'm Hester, i'm from Hong Kong, I love my country and i hope you will like it!

I listed my studio in Sharebnb cause i'm not often in Hong Kong as i work as an translator assistant, i have to travel in different place in the world. 

I love to travel, my favorite destination is Italy, I've been to Rome, Milan.. I love the food there.
I also often go to Singapore, i also live there, few weeks a month, it's amazing there..

reviews.txt: 房东很nice,屋子很舒服,交通位置非常便利｡

Amazing room in the center of Hong Kong. It was perfect for my stay. Hester and her friends were very responsive. I had issues entering the room at first, and Hester immediately took care of it. I'll choose this place again on my next visit.
第一次体验民宿感觉非常棒,房间也很好,很干净整洁,就是稍微小了点,不过性价比还是很高,位置去哪里都很方便
是来到香港之前做的最好的准备之一!很棒的体验!房子地段很好,就在尖沙咀的闹市里,是很有香港味道的地方,房间很干净,很新,各种设备也都很齐全,周围吃的东西也很多,茶餐厅,小吃,离便利店隔地铁都不远!房东人也很nice,帮了我们很多!下次还有机会来香港还会来这里!

It's a small but clean and comfortable studio. Convenient to public transportation and easy access to local restaurants. The owner gave us clean instructions to get here and replied quickly on any question. But if you have big luggage, it's a bit different to climb the narrow stairs as there is no elevator.

Very good communication and directions.
Bed so comfy after a long flight as was good hot shower.
Apartment air conditioned if needed, and quiet.
Enjoyed exploring the area very much, big variety of shops, cafes and walks etc.

Very central location easy to get to by A21 bus from the airport, stop at Kimberley rd. Place is small, Hong Kong standards, very clean, good shower and large flat screen. I definitly recommend this place.
入住前沟通很顺畅,房东和她朋友介绍指引耐心到位,房间干净安静,周围交通方便!
It is a very good
Good! 좁지만아늑한공간이었습니다
干净舒服
房间很干净,地理位置不错,步行5分钟不到可以到达地铁站,设施都很齐全 就是热水器不是很会用,其他都是满意的｡退房时间十点也太早了｡总体来说还是不错的,就是楼道没有电梯｡搬行李非常不方便｡
This is a wonderful experiences stayed at here! Hosted made everything simple and easy to do and respond very fast!highly recommended
Room was clean, located at the heart of TST, just nice for 2pax.
地点还蛮容易找的,而且也很方便,在尖沙驵的闹市里,楼下就有很多茶餐厅,商店等｡房间虽然麻雀虽小但五脏俱全而且很干净,就只是冲凉房的花洒坏了,须要用手握着｡退房时间还真的太早了,而且还蛮准时的｡｡嘻嘻｡｡｡整体上其实还蛮不错的,会推荐给朋友｡｡
Studio agréable, propre et fonctionnel. Bonne communication avec notre hôte.
The directions and information to our room was very accurate and we were kept informed the whole time.

It was a great stay! The room is very nice and clean.  Small size but the space is comfortable and enough for 2 persons. The location of the spartment is highlight, super easy to access to MTR subway, there are many restaurants surrounding and also cosmetic shops. I will stay there again for the next HK trip.
房間很乾淨,而且地理位置也很好,離地鐵走路差不多5分鐘,感謝您的房間讓我們有了一次愉快的香港旅行體驗!

Location and price made this the ideal spot. We were able to get to all the tourist stops and hidden gems within minutes. The MRT is around the corner making transportation a breeze. Rooms small, but it's a room with a bed so what else do you need?

If you're on a budget and are looking for a "local" feel in the heart of Hong Kong, this is it.
